java112.analyzer

Class TokenSizeAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.analyzer.TokenSizeAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Analyzer

    public class TokenSizeAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Analyzer
    This class performs analysis of tokens sizes in a file.
    Since:
    March 24th, 2016
    Author:
    M. Alhassan
